Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Structure Description: Cyclotides are plant-derived miniproteins that have the unusual features of a head-to-tail cyclized peptide backbone and a knotted arrangement of disulfide bonds.
Sequence Information.Function: Probably participates in a plant defense mechanism.
Sequence Information.PTM: This is a cyclic peptide which may contain three disulfide bonds 4-21; 8-23; 13-28.

Literature.Title: A continent of plant defense peptide diversity cyclotides in Australian Hybanthus (Violaceae).
Literature.Author: Simonsen SM, Sando L, Ireland DC, Colgrave ML, Bharathi R, GÃ¶ransson U, Craik DJ.
